title: How to Make Chicken Club Salad

steps.headline: Place 1 1/2 cups of the romaine in each of 4 large bowls or plates.
Mix together the chopped vegetables, chicken and pasta in a mixing bowl.
Add salad dressing; toss lightly to coat.
Divide salad mixture evenly among the 4 bowls.

text: Cook pasta using package directions. Drain pasta and cool. Place 1 1/2 cups of the romaine in each of 4 large bowls or plates.  Mix together the chopped vegetables, chicken and pasta in a mixing bowl.  Add salad dressing; toss lightly to coat.  Divide salad mixture evenly among the 4 bowls.  Finished.
